pageContext.claim: “We are having very good news coming out. The ceasefire is holding. The Kurds are moving out to safer areas beyond the 'safe zone,' as we call it. Having the safe zone is not a bad thing; it’s a good thing.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is spinning bad news as good news. The Turkish invasion he permitted by removing U.S. troops as a buffer allowed Turkish and Russian forces to sweep into areas held by the Kurds.
